医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
运动是治疗抑郁症的有效方法，步行、慢跑、瑜伽和力量训练比其他运动更有效研究人员确定了与抗抑郁药物、心理治疗和控制干预措施相比，治疗重度抑郁症可能最有效的运动方案和剂量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Exercise-is-an- effective-treatment-for-depression-with-walking-jogging-yoga-and-strength-training-more-efficient-than-其他练习.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Exercise-is-an- effective-treatment-for-depression-with-walking-jogging-yoga-and-strength-training-more-efficient-than-其他练习.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=296c62b8-7a92-45d4-a85d-39a41861d916 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 10:39:00 -0500 Exercise is an effective treatment for depression, with walking, jogging, yoga, and strength training more effective than other exercises
研究表明，采用自动化 AI 系统的 CT 成像可以预测 EGFR 基因型，从而经济高效且非侵入性地识别突变状态研究人员开发了一种基于人工智能（AI）的预测系统（AIPS）模型，通过结合放射学、临床和遗传数据来早期检测肺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Study-suggests-CT-imaging-with-automated-AI-system-predicts-EGFR-genotype-identifying-mutation-status-cost-efficiently-and-非侵入性.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Study-suggests-CT-imaging-with-automated-AI-system-predicts-EGFR-genotype-identifying-mutation-status-cost-efficiently-and-非侵入性.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39210fd8-3b36-443f-9332-054d82e5ba0d Fri, 16 Feb 2024 10:12:00 -0500 Study suggests CT imaging with automated AI system predicts EGFR genotype, identifying mutation status cost-effectively and non-invasively
植物性饮食及其与足球运动员氧化生物标志物的关系研究人员通过计算植物性饮食指数得分并确定职业足球运动员氧化应激的尿液生物标志物水平，研究了植物性饮食与氧化生物标志物之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/A-plant-based-diet-and-its-relationship-with-oxygenative-biomarkers-in-footballers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/A-plant-based-diet-and-its-relationship-with-oxygenative-biomarkers-in-footballers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2dd354e9-b43c-466a-a03c-e41eaa3e3f24 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 09:52:00 -0500 A plant-based diet and its relationship with oxidative biomarkers in footballers
第六届CKD药物开发峰会：倒计时开始https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/6th-CKD-Drug-Development-Summit-Countdown-Begins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/6th-CKD-Drug-Development-Summit-Countdown-Begins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0790eb82-66d6-48f8-a16e-26d6a09dd355 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 09:52:00 -0500 6th CKD Drug Development Summit: Countdown Begins
改变癌症治疗：安文达基因组学和基因组测试的未来在本次采访中，Aventa Genomics 的 Chris Roberts 重点介绍了突破性的 Aventa FusionPlus 测试，详细介绍了其在癌症诊断中检测基因融合的卓越能力及其在推进个性化肿瘤治疗中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Transforming-Cancer-Care-Aventa-Genomics-and-the-Future-of-Genomic-Testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Transforming-Cancer-Care-Aventa-Genomics-and-the-Future-of-Genomic-Testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af71bb35-991d-45b9-8543-033360e70916 Fri, 16 Feb 2024 08:59:00 -0500 Transforming Cancer Care: Aventa Genomics and the Future of Genomic Testing
研究揭示冲动、攻击性和网络游戏成瘾之间的联系冲动和攻击性之间的关联是网络游戏障碍的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Study-reveals-link- Between-impulsivity-aggression-and-internet-gaming-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240216/Study-reveals-link- Between-impulsivity-aggression-and-internet-gaming-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24dccca0-a83e-4580-bfe8-4ac4059ea15d Fri, 16 Feb 2024 08:58:00 -0500 Study reveals link between impulsivity, aggression, and internet gaming addiction
